accounts.name: new_authority
docs: New authority accepting the transfer (must be signer)

instructions.name: append_vk_ic_v2
docs: Append IC points to VK (chunked upload step 2, can call multiple times)

accounts.name: depositor
docs: User funding the deposit and paying tx fees

accounts.name: merkle_tree
docs: Merkle tree for commitments belonging to this pool

accounts.name: pending_buffer
docs: Pending deposits buffer (commitments queued for batching)

accounts.name: asset_vault
docs: Asset vault configuration for this asset

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: Vault token account that receives deposited tokens

accounts.name: deposit_vk
docs: Verification key account for the deposit circuit

instructions.name: finalize_vk_v2
docs: Finalize VK after all IC points uploaded (chunked upload step 3)

instructions.name: initialize_vk_v2
docs: Initialize VK with base curve points (chunked upload step 1)

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint for the asset being registered

accounts.name: operator
docs: Relayer operator (owner of the relayer node)

accounts.name: vk_account
docs: Verification key account (PDA based on proof type)

instructions.name: settle_deposits_batch
docs: Settle a batch of deposits using off-chain ZK proof.
Production-grade: verifies Groth16 proof instead of on-chain Merkle insertion.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority performing the settlement (must be pool authority)

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key for MerkleBatchUpdate proof type

accounts.name: relayer_node
docs: Security: PDA seeds ensure this node belongs to relayer_registry.
The `has_one = operator` ensures only the operator can update.
No need for separate `has_one = registry` since seeds already bind it.

instructions.name: withdraw_masp
docs: Withdraw tokens from the shielded pool using a ZK proof.
- Verifies ZK proof proving knowledge of commitment preimage
- Checks merkle root is valid (current or in history)
- Marks nullifier as spent to prevent double-spending
- Enforces recipient_token_account.owner == recipient (from proof public inputs)
- Enforces relayer_token_account.owner == relayer (from proof public inputs)

accounts.name: relayer
docs: Relayer submitting the transaction (pays gas, receives fee)

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: SECURITY: Must be owned by the recipient pubkey from the proof public inputs

accounts.name: relayer_token_account
docs: Relayer's token account for fee (if relayer_fee > 0)
SECURITY: Must be owned by the relayer signer to prevent fee redirection attacks.

accounts.name: spent_nullifier
docs: Spent nullifier account (PDA, created on first use)

errors.name: InvalidPublicInputs
errors.msg: Invalid public inputs for proof verification

errors.name: VerificationKeyNotSet
errors.msg: Verification key not configured for this proof type

errors.name: VerificationKeyLocked
errors.msg: Verification key is locked and cannot be modified

errors.name: ProofNotImplemented
errors.msg: Circuit not implemented: proof verification unavailable

errors.name: VkIcLengthMismatch
errors.msg: VK IC length mismatch for proof type

errors.name: InvalidVerificationKeyType
errors.msg: Invalid verification key type for this operation

errors.name: CryptoNotImplemented
errors.msg: Cryptography not implemented - build with --features insecure-dev for local testing only

errors.name: ProofVerificationFailedInvalid
errors.msg: Proof verification failed - invalid zero-knowledge proof

errors.name: InvalidMerkleRoot
errors.msg: Merkle root not in recent history

errors.name: InvalidTreeDepth
errors.msg: Tree depth must be between 4 and 24

errors.name: InvalidRootHistorySize
errors.msg: Root history size must be at least 30

errors.name: LeafIndexNotFound
errors.msg: Leaf index does not exist in Merkle tree

errors.name: InvalidNullifier
errors.msg: Invalid nullifier: cannot be all zeros

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount: must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Token mint does not match pool configuration

errors.name: DepositsDisabled
errors.msg: Deposits are disabled for this asset

errors.name: WithdrawalsDisabled
errors.msg: Withdrawals are disabled for this asset

errors.name: InvalidAssetId
errors.msg: Invalid asset ID: cannot be all zeros

errors.name: InvalidCommitment
errors.msg: Invalid commitment: cannot be all zeros

errors.name: TooManyOutputs
errors.msg: Too many output commitments for join-split (max 4)

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: caller is not pool authority

errors.name: RecipientMismatch
errors.msg: Recipient does not match proof public inputs

errors.name: RelayerMismatch
errors.msg: Relayer token account owner does not match relayer signer

errors.name: RelayerFeeOutOfRange
errors.msg: Relayer fee out of allowed range

errors.name: RelayerFeeOverflow
errors.msg: Relayer fee calculation overflow - fee is unreasonably large

errors.name: InvalidRelayerNodePda
errors.msg: Invalid RelayerNode PDA: derivation does not match expected seeds

errors.name: RelayerNodeRegistryMismatch
errors.msg: RelayerNode registry mismatch: node does not belong to expected registry

errors.name: BatchNotReady
errors.msg: Batch not ready for processing - timing constraints not met

errors.name: InvalidBatchSize
errors.msg: Invalid batch size - must be between 1 and MAX_BATCH_SIZE

errors.name: FeatureDisabled
errors.msg: Feature not enabled for this pool

errors.name: NotImplemented
errors.msg: Feature not implemented in this version

errors.name: EncryptedNoteRequired
errors.msg: Encrypted note required for this pool

types.name: AssetVault
docs: Asset vault account - one per registered asset

fields.name: min_deposit
docs: Minimum deposit amount (in token base units)

fields.name: shielded_balance
docs: Current shielded balance (should match token account)

fields.name: asset_type
docs: Asset type (0 = SPL Token, 1 = Native SOL wrapped, 2 = Token-2022)

fields.name: metadata_uri
docs: Optional metadata URI for asset info

types.name: BatchSettledEvent
docs: Emitted when a batch of deposits is settled via off-chain proof

fields.name: require_encrypted_note
docs: Whether encrypted note is required on deposits

fields.name: audit_pubkey
docs: Audit public key (for view key decryption)
If set, metadata can be encrypted to this key

types.name: DepositMaspEvent
docs: This event intentionally does NOT include:
- `amount` - Would enable correlation attacks (matching deposit/withdrawal amounts)
- `depositor` - Would link on-chain identity to shielded commitment
- `commitment` - Needed for users to track their deposits
- `asset_id` - Asset type (does not reveal amount or depositor)
While the depositor address is visible in transaction accounts, omitting it
from events makes large-scale indexing and correlation significantly harder.

fields.name: leaf_index
docs: Leaf index assigned in the shared Merkle tree (needed for withdrawal proofs)

types.name: JoinSplitEvent
docs: JoinSplit combines multiple inputs into multiple outputs, breaking
the link between individual deposits and withdrawals.
- Public amount delta (if any external transfer)
- Connection between specific inputs and outputs

fields.name: nullifier_hash_1
docs: Second nullifier hash (zero if only 1 input)

fields.name: output_commitment_1
docs: Second output commitment (zero if only 1 output)

fields.name: public_amount
docs: Public amount delta (positive = deposit, negative = withdraw, 0 = internal)

fields.name: output_leaf_indices
docs: Leaf indices for outputs (needed for subsequent proofs)

types.name: MembershipProofVerified
docs: Used for proving balance >= threshold without revealing actual balance.

fields.name: threshold
docs: Threshold that was proven (user proved they have >= this amount)

types.name: MerkleTreeV2
docs: Incremental Merkle tree state account for MASP v2

fields.name: next_leaf_index
docs: Next leaf index to be filled (also = total leaves inserted)

fields.name: root_history
docs: Root history for withdrawal proofs (circular buffer)
Allows users to prove against recent roots even if tree updated

fields.name: root_history_index
docs: Current position in circular root history buffer

fields.name: root_history_size
docs: Maximum root history size (set at init)

fields.name: filled_subtrees
docs: Contains the rightmost non-zero hash at each level

fields.name: zeros
docs: Precomputed zero values for each level

fields.name: total_leaves
docs: Total deposits by leaf count (for statistics)

fields.name: commitment
docs: Poseidon commitment = H(secret, nullifier, amount, asset_id)
This is a one-way hash and reveals nothing about:
- Which asset was deposited (unless only one asset in pool)

fields.name: timestamp
docs: Timestamp when deposit was added to buffer

fields.name: deposits
docs: Privacy-safe: Contains only commitments and timestamps.
No depositor addresses or amounts stored.

types.name: RelayerRegistry
docs: Relayer Registry - global configuration for all relayers

fields.name: min_fee_bps
docs: Minimum fee in basis points (1 bp = 0.01%)

fields.name: require_stake
docs: Whether relayers must stake to be active

fields.name: total_fees_collected
docs: Total fees collected by all relayers

fields.name: proof
docs: Groth16 proof bytes (256 bytes: A + B + C)

fields.name: batch_size
docs: Number of deposits to process (1 to MAX_BATCH_SIZE)

types.name: SpentNullifierV2
docs: Spent nullifier marker account - pSOL v2

fields.name: nullifier_hash
docs: The nullifier hash that was spent

fields.name: asset_id
docs: Asset ID associated with this nullifier

fields.name: spend_type
docs: Type of operation that spent this nullifier

fields.name: spent_at
docs: Unix timestamp when nullifier was spent

fields.name: spent_slot
docs: Slot number when nullifier was spent

fields.name: relayer
docs: Relayer that submitted the transaction (if any)

types.name: WithdrawMaspEvent
docs: This event intentionally does NOT include:
- `recipient` - Would link withdrawal to recipient identity
While recipient is visible in transaction accounts (required for token delivery),
omitting it from events makes large-scale indexing and correlation significantly
harder - events are the primary data source for most indexing infrastructure.

fields.name: nullifier_hash
docs: Spent nullifier (already public via SpentNullifierV2 account)

fields.name: relayer_fee
docs: Fee paid to relayer (needed for relayer accounting)
